PolyPharma.neo4j_analyzer.IO_Routines.dump_object(dump_filename, object_to_dump)[source]¶

Shorcut for pickling & dumping behavior

Parameters:
  • dump_filename (str) – filename where the object will be dumped
  • object_to_dump (pickable object) – object to be pickled and dumped

Undumps a pickled object

Parameters:dump_filename (str) – filename from which undump
Returns:the undumped object
Return type:object

Dumps a numpy array to csv
